trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeCompleted" name="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> and <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeCompleted" name="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" href=""> </xref> evento del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> classi.

trans-unit.source: An instance of EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Viene creata un'istanza di EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs quando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>oggetto genera il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the result of recognition, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni sul risultato del riconoscimento, accedere il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>proprietà nel gestore per l'evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Emulation is the process by which text, instead of audio, is the input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: L'emulazione è il processo mediante il quale testo, anziché audio, costituisce l'input per un motore di riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: To bypass the audio inputs for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object during emulation, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare gli input audio per un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>dell'oggetto durante l'emulazione, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: If the speech recognition engine encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se il motore di riconoscimento vocale rileva un'eccezione durante l'operazione di riconoscimento, di <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>proprietà è impostata sull'eccezione e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>è impostata su `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the results of emulated recognition.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i risultati del riconoscimento emulato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>deriva dall'oggetto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>e contiene informazioni dettagliate su una frase restituita da un'operazione di riconoscimento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ottenere un elenco di tutti i candidati di riconoscimento dal <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the Result property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se per il riconoscimento viene rilevata un'eccezione durante l'operazione di riconoscimento, di <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>proprietà è impostata sull'eccezione e il risultato è impostata su `null`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni dettagliate sui risultati del riconoscimento, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se si è verificato un errore.
